name: Deliverer
description:
Game made for Something Awful's 10th Game Development Contest with the theme "Critical Omission."

Deliver the message no matter the cost.

Keyboard:

  • AD - Move
  • LMB - Grenade
  • Space - Jump
  • Esc - Display controls

Controller:

  • Left stick - Move
  • A - Jump
  • X - Grenade
  • Start - Display controls

Created by:

Resource, Chernabog and Lutha Mahtin.
